name: SleepNoiseLullaby
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sleep noise lullaby
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Sleep Noise Lullaby lets you reproduce relaxing sleep audio tracks to help you and your baby fall asleep or study.
To add this skill on your Alexa Routines, please do the following:

Enable this Alexa skill.
On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
Click + to add a new routine.
Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
Choose "Your Skills".
Select this skill.
Click Next.
Choose Device to perform the routine to.
Click Save.

Stay updated on Smart Skills also on Instagram!
Smart Skills - (@smartskills.it)
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
